resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my_locations",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "location": {
                "type": "geo_point"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my_locations",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "location": "POINT(4.912350 52.374081)",
        "city": "Amsterdam",
        "name": "NEMO Science Museum"
    },
)
print(resp1)
